main.name: Jasper Ko
main.description: Pain is temporary, giving up is forever.
main.bio: I love applying my web experience in developing and debugging a wide variety of complex web-based business applications to help tech companies reach high growth revenue to further scale their business.

work1.title: Front End Website Software Engineer
work1.description: Worked in a team of 20 developers to build and maintain a robust upgrade version of the client’s software applications which ensured 98% on-time project completion
work1.description1: Worked closely with client to respond quickly to 20 user bugs, permanently resolved them within 2 hours for user training to proceed which positively impacted 100 users with a bug-free system
work1.description2: Contributed to the UI library to create reusable components that saved 100+ hours of development per month
work1.description3: Resolved 30+ Jira tickets weekly which boosted user experience by 95%
work1.description4: Technologies used: Angular 10, TypeScript, HTML5, CSS, Bootstrap, OOP, WebStorm, Visual Studio Code, Jira, GitLab, Swagger, Swagger Hub, Postman

resume.skillmessage1: Languages:   HTML5, CSS3, Typescript, JavaScript, Java, MySQL, Python, MongoDB
resume.skillmessage3: Soft Skills: Communication, Growth mindset, Accountability, Problem-solving, Culture awareness, Empathy

education.description3: Solved all ten problem sets, ten labs, and one final project with perfect correctness

education.description5: Solved all six problem sets with perfect correctness

work.title: Nursing Home Volunteer
work.description: Helped to smoothly facilitate activities weekly for residents achieving 95% participation
work.description2: Engaged with 20+ residents and acted as a physical, emotional, social, and mental support for them
work.description3: Followed best practices for resident care, ensuring resident safety with 0 incident reports
work.description4: Built strong relationships with members of the public to encourage their participation in the annual fund-raising M.A.D. (Make A Difference) race
work.description5: This has resulted in close to 1,800 people taking part in the race and raising a total of $108,000

hobbies.title: Designer
hobbies.description1: Designed 1090 products and made 40 sales in the first month, 4,000 likes and 159 followers
hobbies.description2: Maintained customer satisfaction 100% by implementing designs that meet their needs and wants
